game.name: Spinout
game.history: Spinout has three variations, with the version represented by the GUI created by Binary Arts. Other versions include The Brain, by Mag-Nif, and the traditional Baguenaudier, also known as Chinese Rings or Devil’s needle.
game.board: Spinout is played on a plastic sliding track, with divots on either side of the track.
game.pieces: Spinout contains 5 interlocking pieces that can spin in place. The starting position has every piece oriented to the left, with the exception of the left-most piece that is oriented upwards.
game.tomove: Either rotate the piece in the circular area or slide the entire board left or right.
game.towin: Get all the pieces facing horizontal so that the pieces can be slid out of the frame.

strategy.name: Spinning Out
strategy.description: Make your way left by effectively counting in binary.
